name: Disco Diner
description:
***IF YOU HAVE TROUBLE LOADING THE WEBGL VERSION DOWNLOAD LINK BELOW***

Prepare ingredients to the rhythm of the music! For the Brackey's Game Jam the theme was "Stronger Together" and one of the first things I thought about was how well certain food items are just much stronger when put together...sooooo I made a rhythm cooking game. 

Swipe the food at the right time to add the item to the dish. When all required items are in the dish you will be given a tip. Keep going and score high to land your spot in the diner. Miss the beat and your check will be deducted from. 

Controls:

- Left Click and swipe the ingredients to add them to the dish

Thank you for playing my game!!
